title: League won't load?
body: I just started a ranked game and it won't load, i tried repairing the client and turning off my computer. I can't get it to work, anyone else have this problem? Will i be banned for this?

replies.body: me too bro Im worried i'll get reported too I got a bug splat then tried reconnecting and wouldn't let me I restarted my computer and didn't work now I press play after reloading league and nothing happens

Yeah I'm gonna try to re-install completely, hope it works.
Edit: still not working, hope riot fixes this soon

Hey Aidanator12!

Not being able to load into a ranked game and help your team when can be an incredibly frustrating experience!  Given your description and explanation, it seems as though there might be a 3rd party security program running in the background that is blocking your connection to our Game Servers.  Because of this, I strongly recommend that you complete all of the steps found in this Knowledge Base Article:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/22114820-Firewall-Configuration-for-League-of-Legends

After completing all of the steps in this article, and if you are still experiencing issues, I strongly recommend that you submit a new ticket to Player Support, which you can do here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

If you do submit a ticket, make sure that you provide the following latest and most up to date information:

1) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

2) NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list

4) Please send your most recent r3d log where you experienced the problem (You'll notice that the file name starts with the date/time and ends with r3dlog.txt): https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/22128450-League-of-Legends-Logs

my league of legends client keeps exiting after I click PLAY. This only Happened after i downloaded the update. I really am a regular player and this makes me quite sad/fustrated

im on a mac
